Posts.EditableText: Hi there, this is my first post, but I'm trying to work with QDK (following the tutorial online) and Error 91 pops up all over the place, sometimes even twice in a row. But the "in:" part keeps changing, aparrently blocks are not set all over the place. Also, it seems to be unfinished, when I make a new text block, the block name scrolldown is blank even after I add a new block. And I can't type in it. There is also no way I can even see how many or which text blocks I have. And when I try to run it? First, it says the current game has not been saved, so I click OK and save it to my folder (as House), then it says Error -2147024770 - Automation error The specified module could not be found in frmMain.SaveFile , I click OK, and then it says The current game has changed since it was last saved - if not saved now, bla bla bla and I click Yes, save in the same place as House again (the file is not there) and it gives me the same automation error, and then it says This game will not work properly in Quest as no Start Room has been specified. You can bla bla bla Game menu -> Properties, I click OK, and guess what? There is no Properties in the Game menu. What do I do?
Posts.HTML:
Hi there, this is my first post, but I'm trying to work with QDK (following the tutorial online) and Error 91 pops up all over the place, sometimes even twice in a row. But the "in:" part keeps changing, aparrently blocks are not set all over the place. Also, it seems to be unfinished, when I make a new text block, the block name scrolldown is blank even after I add a new block. And I can't type in it. There is also no way I can even see how many or which text blocks I have. And when I try to run it? First, it says the current game has not been saved, so I click OK and save it to my folder (as House), then it says Error -2147024770 - Automation error The specified module could not be found in frmMain.SaveFile , I click OK, and then it says The current game has changed since it was last saved - if not saved now, bla bla bla and I click Yes, save in the same place as House again (the file is not there) and it gives me the same automation error, and then it says This game will not work properly in Quest as no Start Room has been specified. You can bla bla bla Game menu -> Properties, I click OK, and guess what? There is no Properties in the Game menu.
What do I do?

Posts.EditableText: By the way, I'm at 3.3 in the online tutorial (http://www.axeuk.com/quest/developer/QDK%20Tutorial.pdf).
Posts.HTML: By the way, I'm at 3.3 in the online tutorial (http://www.axeuk.com/quest/developer/QDK%20Tutorial.pdf).

Posts.EditableText: It sounds like one of the QDK components isn't properly registered. Can you please try uninstalling and then reinstalling?
Posts.HTML: It sounds like one of the QDK components isn't properly registered. Can you please try uninstalling and then reinstalling?
